channel.title: Updates on ASP Productions
channel.description: Recent content in Updates on ASP Productions

item.title: Good to catch up with the lovely Jimmy Akingbola today at BAFTA

Looking forward to Talawa Firsts 2019: Fresh Black Voices - Innovative - Electrifying - Unapologetic - at the Ditch at Shoreditch Town Hall to celebrate the UK's most exciting new Black writers and theatre makers from 19th June to 5th July 2019.
Great to see Leeds Playhouse will be staging a new production of Hanif Kureishiâ€™s iconic and Oscar-nominated screenplay MY BEAUTIFUL LAUNDRETTE
Great table reading of WILD ALICE by Hanif Kureishi. Brilliant script and a fabulous cast. Thank you to all who were present for your contributions!
Very much looking forward to STRANGE FRUIT by Caryl Phillips at the Bush. Wonderful to see this production coming back!
